-- | Tests for hmatrix
--   
@package hmatrix-tests
@version 0.4.1.0


-- | Some tests.
module Numeric.LinearAlgebra.Tests
qCheck :: Testable prop => Int -> prop -> IO ()
utest :: String -> Bool -> Test

-- | All tests must pass with a maximum dimension of about 20 (some tests
--   may fail with bigger sizes due to precision loss).
runTests :: Int -> IO ()

-- | Performance measurements.
runBenchmarks :: IO ()
instance Monad m => Monad (MaybeT m)
instance Monad m => Applicative (MaybeT m)
instance Monad m => Functor (MaybeT m)
instance Monad (State s)
instance Applicative (State s)
instance Functor (State s)


-- | Tests for GSL bindings.
module Numeric.GSL.Tests

-- | All tests must pass with a maximum dimension of about 20 (some tests
--   may fail with bigger sizes due to precision loss).
runTests :: Int -> IO ()
